Verses: 1 karththar Sonnadhu: Nee Yoodhaa Raajaavin Aramanaikkup Poi, Ange Sollavendiya Vasanam Ennavendraal:
2 dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththil Veetrirukkira Yoodhaavin Raajaave, Neerum Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Indha Vaasalgalukkul Pravesikkira Ummudaiya Janamumkarththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

3 neengal Nyaayamum Needhiyumseydhu, Parikoduththavanai Odukkugiravanudaiya Kaikkuth Thappuviyungal; Neengal Paradhesiyaiyum Thikkatravanaiyum Vidhavaiyaiyum Odukkaamalum, Kodumaiseyyaamalum, Ivvidaththil Kutramillaadha Raththaththai Sindhaamalum Irungal.

4 indha Vaarththaiyinpadiye Neengal Meyyaai Seyveergalaagil, Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththil Utkaarndhirukkira Raajaakkal Radhangalmelum Kudhiraigalmelum Eri, Avanum Avan Oozhiyakkaararum Avan Janamumaaga Indha Aramanai Vaasalgalin Vazhiyaai Utpravesippaargalendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
5 neengal Indha Vaarththaigalaikkelaamarponeergaleyaagil Indha Aramanai Paazhaaippom Endru Enperil Aanaiyitten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

6 yoodhaa Raajaavin Aramanaiyaik Kuriththuk Karththar: Nee Enakkuk Keeleyaaththaippolavum Leebanonin Kodumudiyaippolavum Irukkiraai, Aanaalum Meyyaagave Naan Unnai Vanaandharaththaippolavum, Kudiyillaadha Pattanangalaippolavum Aakkividuven.
7 sangaarakkaararai Avaravar Aayudhangalodukooda Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Aayaththappaduththuven; Un Uchchidhamaana Kedhurukkalai Avargal Vetti Akkiniyile Poduvaargal
8 anegam Jaadhigal Indha Nagaraththaik Kadandhuvandhu, Avanavan Than Than Ayalaanai Nokki: Indhapperiya Nagaraththukkuk Karththar Ippadi Seydhadhu Ennavendru Ketpaargal.

9 adharkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Avargal Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Udanpadikkaiyai Vittuvittu, Anniya Dhevargalaip Panindhukondu, Avaigalukku Aaraadhanaiseydhapadiyinaal Ippadiyaayitru Enbaargalendru Sollugiraar.
10 mariththavanukkaaga Azhavendaam, Avanukkaagap Paridhabikkavumvendaam, Siraippattupponavanukkaagave Azhungal; Avan Inith Thirumbivaruvadhumillai, Than Janana Boomiyaik Kaanbadhumillai.

11 than Thagappanaagiya Yosiyaavin Pattaththukku Vandhu, Arasaandu, Ivvidaththilirundhu Purappattuppona Yoodhaavin Raajaavaayirundha Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Salloomaikkuriththu: Avan Ini Inge Thirumba Varaamal,
12 thaan Kondupogappatta Sthalaththile Marippaan, Indhadhesaththai Avan Inik Kaanbadhillaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 thanakku Visthaaramaana Veettaiyum, Kaatru Veesum Visaalamaana Melaraigalaiyum Kattuvenendru Solli, Palaganigalaith Thanakkuth Thirandhu, Kedhuru Palagaigalai Vaiththu, Jaadhilingavarunam Poosi,
14 aneedhiyinaale Than Veettaiyum, Aniyaayaththinaale Than Melaraigalaiyum Katti, Than Ayalaan Seyyum Velaikkuk Koolikodaamal Avanai Summaa Velaikollugiravanukku Aiyo!
15 nee Kedhurumara Maaligaigalil Ulaavugirapadiyinaale Raajaavaayiruppaayo? Un Thagappan Pojanabaanampanni, Nyaayamum Needhiyuncheydhapodhu Avan Sugamaai Vaazhndhirukkavillaiyo?
16 avan Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanudaiya Nyaayaththai Visaariththaan; Appozhudhu Sugamaai Vaazhndhaan; Appadi Seyvadhallavo Ennai Arigira Arivu Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
17 un Kangalum Un Manadhumovendraal Tharpozhivinmelum, Kutramillaadha Raththaththai Sindhuvadhinmelum, Idukkamum Norukkudhalum Seyvadhinmelume Allaamal Verondrinmelum Vaikkappadavillai.

18 aagaiyaal, Karththar Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Engira Yoodhaavin Raajaavaikkuriththu: Aiyo! En Sagodharane, Aiyo! Sagodhariye, Endru Avanukkaagap Pulambuvadhillai; Aiyo! Aandavane, Aiyo! Avarudaiya Magaththuvame, Endru Avanukkaagap Pulambuvadhillai.
19 oru Kazhudhai Pudhaikkappadugiravannamaai Avan Erusalemin Vaasalgalukku Veliye Izhuththerindhu Pudhaikkappaduvaan Endru Sollugiraar.
20 leebanoninmelerip Pulambu, Paasaanil Uraththa Saththamidu, Aabareemilirundhu Kooppittukkondiru, Un Nesar Anaivarum Murindhaargal.
21 nee Sugamaai Vaazhndhirukkaiyil Naan Unakku Sonnen, Nee Kelen Endraai, Un Siruvayadhumudhal Nee En Saththaththaik Kelaamarpogiradhe Un Vazhakkam.
22 un Meyppargal Ellaaraiyum Kaatru Adiththukkondupogum; Un Nesar Siraippattuppovaargal; Appodhallavo Ellaap Pollaappinimiththamum Nee Vetkappattu Lachchaiyadaivaai.

23 leebanonil Vaasamaayirundhu, Kedhurumarangalil Koodukattikkondirukkiravale, Vedhanaigalum Pillaipperugiravalukkoththa Vaadhaiyum Unakku Varugaiyil Nee Evvalavu Paridhabikkappadaththakkavalaayiruppaai!

24 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeemin Kumaaran Koniyaa En Valadhukaiyin Muththirai Modhiramaayirundhaalum, Adhilirundhu Unnaik Kazhatri Erindhupoduven Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
25 un Praananai Vaangaththedugiravargalin Kaiyilum Nee Bayappadugiravargalin Kaiyilum Unnai Oppukkoduppen; Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarin Kaiyilum Kaldheyarin Kaiyilum Oppukkoduppen;
26 unnaiyum, Unnaip Petra Thaayaiyum, Ungal Janana Boomiyallaadha Anniya Dhesaththile Thuraththividuven. Ange Saaveergal.
27 thirumbuvadharkuth Thangal Aaththumaa Vaanjikkum Dhesaththukku Avargal Thirumbivaruvadhillai.

28 koniyaa Engira Indha Manushan Avamadhikkappatta Udaindha Silaiyo? Oruvarum Virumbaadha Paaththiramo? Avanum Avan Sandhadhiyum Thallundadhum, Thaangal Ariyaadhadhesaththile Thuraththividappattadhum Edhu?
29 dhesame! Dhesame! Dhesame! Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kel.

30 indhap Purushan Sandhaanamatravan, Than Naatkalil Vaazhvadaiyaadhavan Endru Ivanaikkuriththu Ezhudhungal; Avan Viththil Oruvanaagilum Vaazhvadaindhu, Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththil Veetrirundhu Yoodhaavil Arasaalappogiradhillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
